common_issues.title: JetBrains plugin installation issue
common_issues.description: Users are unable to install a specific JetBrains plugin because it's not found in the JetBrains Marketplace.  The error message "404 Publisher Model not found" suggests an issue with the plugin's availability or the user's access.  Verify plugin compatibility with the JetBrains IDE version and ensure the plugin is published correctly in the Marketplace.

related_issues.title: pieces Jetbrains plugin
related_issues.text:
pieces Jetbrains plugin
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, JetBrains

### Operating System / Platform

macOS

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [x] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I'd like to install a JetBrains plugin, but it doesn't exist in the JetBrains Marketplace.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate and resolve the JetBrains plugin installation issue.  The "404 Publisher Model not found" error suggests a problem with plugin availability or user access.  Check plugin compatibility with JetBrains IDE versions and ensure correct publishing on the Marketplace.
Proactively monitor and address the 'pieces Jetbrains plugin' issue (ID 849) due to its high activity level. This will help prevent similar issues from arising in the future.
